channel.title: Danielle Farrel on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Danielle Farrel on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Your Options Understood: Danielle Farrel
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan DF - Dr Danielle Farrel MM On this podcast for Iriss I went to interview Dr Danielle Farrel. Danielle Farrel owns her own company called ‘Your Options Understood’, so I went to find out more about it. So Danielle, why did you set up your business? DF I set Your Options Understood up back in 2015 after I’d finished my PhD and graduated from university. I guess I set it up for two reasons really.

item.title: Personal stories of coping in lockdown
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan CB - Chris Baird DF - Dr Danielle Farrel WG - Wesley Grierson LK - Lindsay Kinloch MM On this edition of Iriss.fm I went to hear people’s views that have a disability, and how it impacts on their lives, in the current crisis that we’re facing. First up I spoke to local campaigner and national campaigner, Chris Baird. Chris is from Barrhead and he tells us his views on the coronavirus.
